name: Ultimate Boob Wars!!: Big Breasts vs Flat Chests

files.file1: N/A:Please select the first MangaGamer archive

files.file2: N/A:Please select the second MangaGamer archive

files.file3: N/A:Please select the third MangaGamer archive

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the first MangaGamer archive
- file2: N/A:Please select the second MangaGamer archive
- file3: N/A:Please select the third MangaGamer archive
game:
  exe: drive_c/Games/Mangagamer/Boob Wars 2/Boob Wars 2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file1
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file2
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file3
- task:
    args: /sp- /silent /norestart
    executable: $CACHE/BoobWars2.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
